price: ߣߴߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߞߵߌ ߛߐ߬ߛߐ߬ ߌ ߦߴߊ߬ ߝߐ߫ ߞߏ߫ ߒߠߋ ߛߋ߲߬ߓߐߣߍ߲߫ ߠߋ߬ ߊߟߎ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߓߊ߯ߙߊ ߟߎ߬ ߘߐ߫
arabic: فَإِنۡ عَصَوۡكَ فَقُلۡ إِنِّي بَرِيٓءٞ مِّمَّا تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: fa-in ʿaṣawka faqul innī barīon mimmā taʿmalūna
